name: rpn3d
description: A 3D solid builder using Reverse Polish Notation
author: dagrende <dag.rende@find-out.se>

scripts.deploystable: npm run build && sed 's#/dist#dist#' index.html | ssh dev.find-out.se 'cat >public_html/rpn3d/index.html' && scp -r dist src dev.find-out.se:public_html/rpn3d && rm -rf dist
scripts.deploynext: npm run build && sed 's#/dist#dist#' index.html | ssh dev.find-out.se 'cat >public_html/rpn3dnext/index.html' && scp -r dist src dev.find-out.se:public_html/rpn3dnext && rm -rf dist
scripts.deploydev: npm run build && cp -r dist public && rm -rf dist
